ExampleDefinition.Title: Fan Chart
ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates how to use multiple Band-Series to simulate a Fan Chart
ExampleDefinition.Description: <Run FontSize="14" FontWeight="Bold">Fan Chart</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">Demonstrates how to use multiple Band-Series to simulate a Fan Chart.</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">The FastBandRenderableSeries requires an XyyDataSeries, which has X,Y0,Y1 points, to display a solid band between high and low Y-value.</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">In this example, we overlay several Band-Series with varying opacity to simulate a Fan-chart.</Run>
